title: NEWS: Trump Grows Angry as Media Intensifies Focus on His Health, Frequent Drowsiness, and Noted Cognitive Slips
description: Trump grows angry over coverage about his inability to stay awake during meetings. Patel orders agents to escort his girlfriend's friends home after night out. An important news update this morning.
content: Good morning, everyone. Im tracking several major developments today, including growing frustration inside the White House as the President becomes increasingly enraged over coverage showing him stru… [+8631 chars]
